About Me.

Computer Engineer

Info

My name is Orestis Efthymiou and I studied Computer Engineer & Informatics at the University of Patras.

Having more than two years of experience in the IT sector in food industry I have become proficient in data handling.

During my thesis I made a research and analysed the architecture of four DBMS: Cassandra, MongoDB, HBase, Neo4j.

Experience

Although it might seem hard to become a self-taught developer my passion for coding has inspired me to keep on learning new things.

This is why i have implemented several mini-projects and completed some tutorials with MERN stack.

I have also experimented with LAMPP stack.

HTML, CSS, and JavaScript are my basic tools that I use in my projects.

React is my favorite JavaScript Framework.

Bootstrap and Materialize-UI are CSS Frameworks that makes me happy to use them.
